channel.title: Dongji Rescue on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Dongji Rescue on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Guan Hu’s $80 Million War Epic ‘Dongji Rescue’ Heads to U.K., European Cinemas
item.description: Hailed as one of China’s most technically ambitious films to date, the big-budget epic dramatizes the sinking of the Lisbon Maru — a deadly, little-known disaster that claimed hundreds of British POWs
